page.title: 16Billingham Ice Skating Rink
page.content: Every Saturday I go ice skating to the Forum Ice Rink at 10.00. My mam or dad takes me. I have my own boots and i wear a tracksuit. I have 9 NSA (National Skating Association) badges. I have one jump to learn before I start double and triple loots. I have a private lesson of 15 minutes. I am learning the sit-spin, where you go down on one leg into a little ball, and the parallel spin, where you go round with one leg out and one leg on the ground. I practise and then go home at 11.30. It is nice to jump in the air and land without falling over. Ice shows are staged at Christmas and there are seats for over 1000 people. The ice rink has a successful ice hockey team which travels around the country playing matches.
